intro: Google is hiring Frontend Developer Interns for students who want to build user-facing products at scale. This internship focuses on modern web engineering, accessibility, and performance optimization across high-traffic products.
jobDescription: As a Frontend Developer Intern, you will collaborate with product and design teams to create responsive interfaces, improve user experience, and maintain high-quality web standards. You will work on production-grade systems and receive mentorship from experienced engineers.
responsibilities: Build and improve reusable UI components
Work with APIs and data integration layers
Participate in testing and code review
minQualifications: Pursuing B.Tech/B.E., BCA, MCA, or related program
Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Basic knowledge of React or similar frontend framework
howToApply: Apply through the official Google Careers portal. Use an updated resume, include project links, and complete the application form carefully.
author: StudentTechProjects Team
